params.initialLimit: initial limit for maximum collateral total supply

params.index: index of the entity to get

returns._0: if the given address is an entity

create(address,uint256,address).notice: Create a default collateral with a given asset.

entity(uint256).notice: Get an entity given its index.

isEntity(address).notice: Get if a given address is an entity.

totalEntities().notice: Get a total number of entities.
